  Esports betting with Betway - 30€ Free bet for new customers!
</h1>
<p>
  If you are looking for a betting site that has invested a lot in esports betting, but at the same time offers a wide range of items from the traditional sports side then Betway is the perfect
  choice for you. Betway has a long history both in itself, but also with their massive investment in esports. Not many operators has taken esports close to as serious as Betway, and it shows.
</p>
<p>
  Betway offers a whole lot of esports games such as CS: GO, League of Legends, Dota2, Overwatch, Hearthstone, Rainbow Six, Call of Duty and Rocket League games. If that wasn’t enough they offer
  even more games during major tournaments. The range of games is really astonishing and no one can compete with Betway here. The selections inside the games themselves are also massive, but
  we’ll cover more of that later. When combined with the fact that the odds are often better than the competitors then Betway is the right place for the esports bettor. 
</p>
<p>
  Betway has been offering high odds since 2006 and has been popular with players throughout its history. Betway is licensed by the Malta Gaming Authority (MGA), so the safety and fairness of
  betting is guaranteed. New customers on Betway will receive a 100% deposit bonus of up to €100 and other variable welcome bonuses from Betway. These bonuses are very good compared to
  competitors and can be used to place bets on both esports and traditional sports. It is time for us to take a closer look at what Betway has to offer and if they truly are the kings of esports
  betting!
</p>
<h2>
  Betway overview
</h2>
<div class="table-responsive">
  <table class="table"><tbody>
<tr>

        </td>

        </td>
      </tr>

        </td>

<h2>
  Available esports games at Betway
</h2>
<h3>
  Counter-Strike: Global Offensive (CS:GO)
</h3>
<p>
  CS:GO has been a fan favourite for years and there doesn’t seem to be anything that can stop this massive FPS game. Every year there is major tournaments together with classics such as ESL One
  Cologne and IEM Katowice. These tournaments and many more suit themself amazingly for esports betting. At Betway CS:GO is a big focus and while all big tournaments are a given, they also
  provide smaller tournaments on a regional level.
</p>
<h3>
  Dota 2
</h3>
<p>
  Dota 2 is a MOBA game that has taken the world by storm since its release in 2013. Yearly Valve arranges the massive tournament The International that year after year breaks prize pool records
  in the esports scene. Betway offers a vast selection of Dota 2 games and if you are a fan of the game, Betway might be perfect for you!
</p>
<h3>
  League of Legends
</h3>
<p>
  League of Legends is arguably the most popular esports game in the world as its viewership numbers are through the roof every single year. It all concludes with the game’s world championship,
  Worlds, that draws the best team from around the world to a massive showdown. Betway offers all the biggest leagues such as LEC, LCS, LCK and LPL, but they also provide games from a whole lot
  of smaller regions and leagues.
</p>
<h3>
  StarCraft 2
</h3>
<p>
  Starcraft has paved the way for esports as a whole for decades and SC2 still has big following around the world. The game has seen a Korean dominance for a long time, but the rise of the
  Finnish Joona “Serral” Sotala has sparked life in the western scene the last few years. Betting on SC2 can be incredibly entertaining and Betway has close to all the big games from tournaments
  such as IEM Katowice and ESL Pro League.
</p>
<h3>
  PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds (PUBG)
</h3>
<p>
  PUBG might not reach the levels of the massive Fortnite, but it still remains a popular esports game with tournaments around the year. Betting on PUBG might not be an easy task, but the clutch
  moments and exciting game endings can make anyone a fan. 
</p>
<h3>
  Other Games
</h3>
<ul>
<li>Rocket League
  </li>
  <li>Call of Duty
  </li>
  <li>Rainbow Six
  </li>
  <li>Hearthstone
  </li>
  <li>King of Glory
  </li>
  <li>Overwatch
  </li>
</ul>
<p>
  These games may not be as popular in terms of pure numbers, but that doesn’t mean Betway doesn’t offer great selections and odds on them. It’s a great plus for the fans, since quite a few other
  sites only focuses on Dota 2, CS:GO and League of Legends. Betways passion for esports really shines through in this area as a whole - the amount of games, the amount of selection for each
  match. It’s a complete package and one of the biggest positives you can have for an esports betting site!
</p>
<h2>
  Betway welcome bonus - 30€ Free Bet!
</h2>
<p>
  As a new customer at Betway you will receive a free bet worth up to 30€. Your first deposit is matched with 100%. The free bet will appear on your account as soon as you have made bets for the
  value of the initial deposit. This bonus can be used for any sport or esports game. This bonus is a lucrative one as it does not have a wager requirement attached to it. 
</p>
<h2>
  How to convert your free bet at Betway to cash
</h2>
<p>
  When you have deposited at Betway for the first time you will receive a free bet for the same value as the deposit, up to 30€. Turning the free bet into your withdrawal balance happens as
  follows:
</p>
<ul>
<li>The free bet can be used on a single bet, each-way bet or a system bet. The follow requirements must then be met.
  </li>
  <li>Single bet - must be placed at odds of 1.75 or higher.
  </li>
  <li>Each-way bet - the place part of the best must be placed at odds of 1.4 or higher.
  </li>
  <li>System bet - each selection must be placed at odds of 1.4 or higher.
  </li>
  <li>When your bet is settled you will receive the winnings, excluding the initial bet amount.
  </li>
  <li>Example: 30€ free bet is placed on the odds of 4.0 - In case of a win you will receive 90€, instead of the 120€ that would usually be the case.
  </li>
  <li>When you have received the winnings to your balance there are no further requirements.
  </li>
</ul>
<h2>
  Deposits and withdrawals
</h2>
<p>
  Betway offers many options for both depositing and withdrawing money. In both cases, the minimum amount is 10€, which is a moderately normal minimum amount. Maximum amounts vary by payment
  method. When depositing money, the money is transferred almost immediately, but when withdrawing money, the payment period for most payment methods is about a day and for a bank transfer / card
  payment 3-4 days.
</p>
<h3>
  Payment methods
</h3>
<ul>
<li>Deposit: VISA/Mastercard, Skrill, Neteller, Eco, MuchBetter, AstroPay, paysafecard, Bank Transfer
  </li>
  <li>Withdrawal: VISA, Skrill, Neteller, Eco, MuchBetter
  </li>
</ul>
<h2>
  Features and user-friendliness ay Betway
</h2>
<p>
  The betting section is clearly built and easy to use. The items are divided into games and tournaments, so the match you want is a couple of easy clicks away. This makes the bettor's life very
  easy. It cannot be said that Betway is the most beautiful site on the market, but its power lies in its simplicity and functionality and not in its beauty. Betways live betting section honestly
  needs some work in its functionality, even if it does its job somewhat decently. For an example you can’t have several tabs open, which can cause issues when following several games. As a
  result, you will need to scroll back and forth through the page to take turns visiting the destinations you want. However, browsing is made easier by a very well-functioning search feature.
  Even if you imagine that search is a basic feature, on all sites it will not work nearly as well as on Betway. Betway offers a smooth and easy experience for the bettor and if you survive with
  the power of one tab, Betway is a very good choice.
</p>
<h2>
  Betway on mobile devices
</h2>
<p>
  Betway has optimized its website to work on mobile devices and has also created its own mobile application. Both options offer all the betting services available to you and you end up using
  either one, browsing the site is just as easy as on a computer. It is rare that a site with a mobile application has also invested in the operation of the site on mobile devices, but Betway has
  put itself in full swing with respect to both. The mobile app is free to download for both iOS and Android based devices, meaning it works almost on any phone.
</p>
<h2>
  Betways customer service
</h2>
<p>
  Betway runs its customer service on a separate Betway Help site. The site has a wealth of frequently asked questions and answers, as well as video guides for using the various features of the
  site. Betway also serves via Live Chat, but finding it is a couple of twists and turns away as Betway first offers very few questions and answers and only if these do not provide an answer to
  your problem will it let the customer into Live Chat. Our experience with said live support has in truth not been the greatest and Betways choice to outsource this is something that seems to
  have caused some issues. As much as many others things with Betway are great for esports betting, this is not one of them. The plus side is that you can reach them 24 hours a day, but we truly
  hope this part of their operation gets improved.
</p>
<h2>
  Registration on the Betway website
</h2>
<p>
  Joining the Betway site is very easy and does not take long. The “Register” button allows you to enter your account login information, personal information and contact information, after which
  your account is ready to use. As always when registering with a sportsbook take a good look at the terms and conditions. As is ruled by regulation you will have to provide Betway with
  verification of your identity(KYC) before making withdrawals. This is a mandatory process to protect all parties involved. During the time your account is being verified you are more than
  welcome to place your first bets and use your free bet as well!
</p>
<h2>
  Responsible gaming
</h2>
<p>
  Betway is registered under the license of the Malta Gaming Authority and through it must comply with the regulations and instructions given regarding gambling. For a customer who wants to limit
  their play, there are two different ways to limit themselves: a deposit ceiling and a temporary closing of a game account. Betway also provides links to various parties who can help assess and
  help with a potential gambling problem. Betway verifies the identity of all users so that they cannot play on the Betway website through identity theft.
</p>
<h3>
  Security, privacy and fair play
</h3>
<p>
  Betway invests heavily in player safety. As soon as the account is created, it verifies the identity of the players so that they cannot play on the Betway site through identity theft. Betway's
  license to the Malta Gaming Authority guarantees the strictest possible restrictions that the site must respect. Betway also provides tips and guidance for parents and players in general on how
  to play safely. Betway wants to make sure that every player feels safe and that the privacy of the players is protected.
</p>
<h2>
  Betway summary
</h2>
<p>
  Betway is a veteran of the industry and it shows in many areas. They have established themselves as the home of esports and that does show through the many games offered and the vast selections
  inside of these. The site itself work well enough and it’s an easy task to navigate yourself to wherever you want. Same is true for mobile use of Betway, which works flawlessly. The new player
  bonus at Betway is a fairly moderate one, but the upside is that it’s not attached to a wagering requirement and that can suit some players better than others. So far so good, but we have to
  bring up the negatives too, and for us that is the customer support - it’s a challenging task to find live chat support to begin with and when you do, sure, you are greeted by friendly people,
  but the information and overall feeling of problem solving is not great. One fact still remains when all is said and done - Betway has a passion for esports and they are constantly pushing the
  boundaries for bringing it forward. Depending on who you are Betway might suit you perfectly, or at the very least offer you an above average experience when it comes to esports betting!
</p></div><!----><!----><!----><!----></div><div class="author container-inner container-vertical"><div class="row"><div class="column img-col no-m-p"><img src="https://cdn.esportsvikings.com/global/images/authors/janne.kouva_author_200x200.jpg" alt="Janne Kouva image"/></div><div class="column no-m-p"><p class="no-m-p"><strong>Janne Kouva</strong></p><span class="date"> 26 March 2020 </span><!----><!----></div></div></div><!----></div></div></gl-article><!----><!----><!----></app-article><!----><!----></div>
